bug.question: I have wings and like to buzz. I make yummy honey. Who am I?
I crawl on the ground and carry things. I work hard with my friends. Who am I?

hints.text: 💪 I can lift things much bigger than myself

bug.question: I have spots and I'm red. People say I bring good luck. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle
🔴 I have black dots on my back
🌱 You can find me in a garden

bug.question: I jump very high and I'm green. I like to eat plants. Who am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually the color of grass

bug.question: I spin a web and catch my food. I have eight legs. Who am I?
I start as a caterpillar and turn into something beautiful that flies. Who am I?
I glow in the dark on summer nights. I am a type of beetle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🔦 People like to catch me in jars

bug.question: I make a cozy home of silk, called a chrysalis. Then I emerge with wings. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I change form when I grow up
🍃 I eat leaves when I am young.

bug.question: I have a long body and lots of legs. I live under rocks and logs. Who am I?

hints.text: 👣 I have many pairs of legs

bug.question: I hatch from an egg in water, then I fly around lakes. I am food for fish and bats. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I start my life in water
🪰 I have delicate wings and big eyes

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I am a colorful fish that Nemo is. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I have orange and white stripes.
🎬 You can watch a movie about me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?
I have a shell and live in the sea. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.

ocean.correctionDetails: The original correct answer 'A snail' is incorrect as snails do not typically live in the sea. The best answer given the prompts would be a sea snail.

ocean.question: I am very big and blue, and I sing a song. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, two claws, and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?
I have pointy teeth and swim very fast in the ocean. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 I have lots of sharp teeth.

ocean.question: I have a long body, a hard shell, and I lay eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ I sometimes live in the ocean and come onto the beach.
🥬 I like to eat sea grass.

ocean.question: I'm a small, colorful fish that swims with many others. We all move together in the same direction. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 We swim in a group for safety.
✨ We look like one giant fish when we move together.
🌈 We can be many different colors.

ocean.question: I'm a hard, shiny thing you can find on the beach. Sometimes, you can hear the ocean if you hold me to your ear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I am the home of a creature that lived in the sea.
🌊 You find me near the sea.
👂 You can listen to me, but I don't talk.
